books.author: by Phil Jackson and Hugh Delehanty
books.description: An autobiography by the coach who led the Chicago Bulls and the Los Angeles Lakers to multiple N.B.A. championships.
books.name: ELEVEN RINGS

books.author: by Phil Robertson with Mark Schlabach
books.description: The Duck Commander pays tribute to “faith, family and ducks.”
books.name: HAPPY, HAPPY, HAPPY

books.author: by Sheryl Sandberg with Nell Scovell
books.description: The chief operating officer of Facebook urges women to pursue their careers without ambivalence.
books.name: LEAN IN

books.author: by Eben Alexander
books.description: A neurosurgeon recounts his near death experience during a coma from bacterial meningitis.
books.name: PROOF OF HEAVEN

books.author: by David Sedaris
books.description: Essays from the humorist on subjects like French dentistry and a North Carolina Costco.
books.name: LET'S EXPLORE DIABETES WITH OWLS

books.author: by Rick Atkinson
books.description: The final volume of the Liberation Trilogy describes the Allied victory in Europe, from D-Day in June 1944 to the German surrender 11 months later.
books.name: THE GUNS AT LAST LIGHT

books.author: by Gianna Angelopoulos
books.description: A memoir by a lawyer who was instrumental in rescuing the 2004 Olympic Games in Athens from possible disaster.
books.name: MY GREEK DRAMA

books.author: by Glenn Beck and others
books.description: An argument against gun restriction laws.
books.name: CONTROL

books.author: by Tina Fey
books.description: A memoir from the former "Saturday Night Live" star and creator of "30 Rock."
books.name: BOSSYPANTS

books.author: by Cheryl Strayed
books.description: A woman’s account of a life-changing 1,100-mile hike along the Pacific Crest Trail during the summer of 1995.
books.name: WILD

books.author: by Chris Kyle with Scott McEwen and Jim DeFelice
books.description: A member of the Navy SEALs discusses his childhood, his marriage and his battlefield experiences during the Iraq war. Kyle was recently shot to death in Texas.
books.name: AMERICAN SNIPER

books.author: by Bill O'Reilly
books.description: A “highlight reel” of previous writings, updated, from the host of “The O’Reilly Factor.”
books.name: KEEP IT PITHY

books.author: by Justin Halpern
books.description: A coming-of-age memoir organized around the musings, purveyed on Twitter, of the author’s father.
books.name: _____ MY DAD SAYS

books.author: by Jimmy Connors
books.description: A memoir by the bad boy of 1970s tennis, who was for a time the world’s top-ranked, and probably most obnoxious, player.
books.name: THE OUTSIDER

books.author: by Jim Gaffigan
books.description: The comedian’s life with five kids in a two-bedroom New York City apartment.
books.name: DAD IS FAT
